page.title: 07 SCHOOLS IN OUR AREA
page.content: Schools in our area are divided on religious grounds.{CATHOLIC SCHOOLS} {and NON DENOMINATIONAL}schools.In Kilsyth there are 3 non-denominational schools. {_ Kilsyth Primary {_ Balmalloch Primary {_ Kilsyth Academy Children who want to attend a Catholic school must attend.{ST.PATRICKS.}or {ST.MAURICES.}In our block there are 2 schools Balmalloch Primary and Kilsyth Academy.The Primary School takes pupils from 5-12 years old and teaches them the basics.The Academy takes pupils from 12-18,and provides a wider range of studies.It has 908 pupils. At present,education is being disturbed by teacher strikes who are protesting about pay and conditions.
